findings.message:

findings.message:
Reentrancy in MainchainGatewayManager.depositERC20For(address,address,uint256) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#911-921):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(IERC20(_token).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_amount),MainchainGatewayManager: ERC-20 token transfer failed) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#916-919)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _createDepositEntry(_user,_token,20,_amount) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#920)
		- _depositId = depositCount ++ (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1173)
	- _createDepositEntry(_user,_token,20,_amount) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#920)
		- deposits.push(_entry) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1172)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in MainchainGatewayManager.withdrawERC721For(uint256,address,address,uint256,bytes) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1088-1119):
	External calls:
	- ! _tryERC721TransferFrom(_token,address(this),_user,_tokenId) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1111)
		- (success) = _token.call(abi.encodeWithSelector(IERC721(_token).transferFrom.selector,_from,_to,_tokenId)) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1226-1230)
	- require(bool,string)(IERC721Mintable(_token).mint(_user,_tokenId),MainchainGatewayManager: Minting ERC721 token to gateway failed) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1112-1115)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _insertWithdrawalEntry(_withdrawalId,_user,_token,_tokenId) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1118)
		- withdrawals[_withdrawalId] = _entry (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1200)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in MainchainGatewayManager.withdrawERC20For(uint256,address,address,uint256,bytes) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1024-1068):
	External calls:
	- _withdrawETHFor(_user,_amount) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1048)
		- WETH(_weth).withdraw(_amount) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1212)
	- require(bool,string)(IERC20Mintable(_token).mint(address(this),_amount.sub(_gatewayBalance)),MainchainGatewayManager: Minting ERC20 token to gateway failed) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1053-1056)
	- require(bool,string)(IERC20(_token).transfer(_user,_amount),Transfer failed) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1059)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _withdrawETHFor(_user,_amount) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1048)
		- _user.toPayable().transfer(_amount) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1213)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _insertWithdrawalEntry(_withdrawalId,_user,_token,_amount) (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1062-1067)
		- withdrawals[_withdrawalId] = _entry (../..0x8407dc57739bcda7aa53ca6f12f82f9d51c2f21e.sol#1200)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign
